content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: USUBJID
      operator: non_empty
    - name: COSEQ
      operator: is_not_unique_set
      value: USUBJID
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.311
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when COSEQ is not unique within USUBJID or within POOLID
Outcome:
  Message: The value of COSEQ is not unique within USUBJID
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '311'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The sequence number must be unique for each record
                  within a USUBJID or POOLID, whichever applies for the record.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: '5.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - CO

json.Description: Raise an error when COSEQ is not unique within USUBJID or within POOLID

Outcome.Message: The value of COSEQ is not unique within USUBJID

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The sequence number must be unique for each record within a USUBJID or POOLID, whichever applies for the record.
